file_content.text: Get away from him! I--I'm warning you! I won't let you hurt him!
Nadia, don't!
You'll just end up shooting yourself, girl. Drop it, or your father and your Jedi friend here will die very, very slowly.
Your father's safe now. I won't let anyone else be harmed.
Calm down, Nadia.
No, Jedi. My orders were "no survivors," and it'll be a pleasure to obey.
Why have you done this? These people are no threat to you.
Explain this attack, Sith.
Hardly a challenge either. But I know better than to question my orders.
Your attack has failed. Now prepare to face justice for what you have done.
This ends now.
I see no failure. My mission will soon be complete.
Your ambassadors will die, and this ship will be destroyed.
Pitiful. Like slaughtering nexu cubs. But Lord Kyrus demands that your "Rift Alliance" suffer and fall.
Who is this "Lord Kyrus"?
Lord Kyrus?
A master I'm honored to serve.
Tell me where to find Lord Kyrus. You don't need to be his slave.
I could free you from him.
Slave? I do Lord Kyrus's will. He grants me more freedom than any brainwashed Jedi.
Whoever Kyrus is, he's sent you on your final mission.
He'll be disappointed.
Hmm. My lord might find the girl an appealing prize of war... once she's incapacitated.
But the others must die. It is commanded. And you, Jedi, are in my way.
